description:
An efficient solar powered watch wrapped in a lightweight titanium case. If you hate having to get your battery changed, or having to regularly reset automatics, the Atlas Eclipse Solar edition makes life easier. Momentum has brought back their classic Atlas watch line, only now it is sustainably powered by the sun, and any other light source.

  • Efficient solar panel keeps your watch running, no battery changes needed
  • Full battery lasts up to 6 months in complete darkness
  • White face lets light through to the solar panel and is easy to read in low light conditions
  • Solid titanium case protects the workings against buffets and blows
  • Rugged sapphire crystal is virtually scratch proof
  • Hour, minute, and second hand with date
  • Superluminous hands and 12, 6, and 9 o’clock indicators are legible in low light
  • Rubber wrist band performs well in wet and moist environments
  • Case diameter with crown is 38mm. Thickness is 11.5mm
name: Momentum Atlas Eclipse Solar Watch - Unisex
